item_title: Compaction Backend Choice (LLM or Coding CLI)
summary: Added compaction backend config option (llm/coding_cli) with CodingCLIProvider implementation, CLI wiring, and comprehensive tests.
pattern_that_worked: Reused existing LLMProvider interface for CodingCLIProvider to maintain consistent abstraction over backend selection.
validation_hint: uv run pytest tests/test_compact.py -q passed (21 tests)
